products.name: Coactive Multimodal AI Platform
products.description: The Coactive Multimodal AI Platform is a powerful, flexible way for developers to create game-changing apps, fast.

provenance.snippet: Power your video and image apps the easy way The Coactive Multimodal AI Platform is a powerful, flexible way for developers to create game-changing apps, fast.

leadership.name: Cody Coleman
leadership.previous_affiliation: eBay, Google, Lyft, Meta, Clio, HubSpot, Tesla, MIT, Stanford
leadership.education: PhD in Computer Science from Stanford, MEng and BS degrees in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from MIT

provenance.snippet: Cody Coleman is the co-founder and CEO of Coactive AI. He is also a co-creator of DAWNBench and MLPerf, a founding member of MLCommons.

leadership.name: Will Gaviria Rojas
leadership.education: PhD in Materials Science from Northwestern University, BS from MIT

provenance.snippet: Will Gaviria Rojas is the co-founder of Coactive AI. A former Data Scientist at eBay, Will has also previously held various roles as a visiting researcher.

leadership.name: Jesper Stroe
leadership.education: MBA with a major in Finance

provenance.snippet: Jesper has worked as a CFO/COO, both as an advisor, consultant, and full-time member of the executive team in early-stage technology companies for more than two decades.

leadership.name: Tia Gordon
leadership.education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration with a focus in Human Resources Management

provenance.snippet: Tia brings over 20 years of progressive leadership experience in people, operations, and organizational strategy across high-growth startups and established companies.

leadership.name: Satya Komala
leadership.education: Bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering from VIT, India, and an MBA from the Wharton School of Business

provenance.snippet: Satya brings nearly 19 years of extensive experience in leading engineering, product development, and strategic initiatives across renowned organizations.

leadership.name: Josh Heller
leadership.education: Bachelor’s from the Goizueta Business School at Emory University, Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) designation

provenance.snippet: Josh serves as Coactive’s Chief Revenue Officer, responsible for both sales & business development.

leadership.name: Barbara Lewis
leadership.education: Graduated with honors from the Stanford Graduate School of Business and Yale University

provenance.snippet: Barbara has over 20 years of experience in tech marketing, working at companies of all stages, from very early stage startups to large, publicly traded global corporations.
